release.action: Update security related jackson-databind dependency.
Change codelist namespace to http://standards.iso.org/iso/19139/resources/gmxCodelists.xml
Special csw interface transformation for partner hamburg
Fix security issues by dependency updates
Fix problem not showing anchor tags in csw interface response.
Fix sortby feature.
Create communication.xml if not exists.
Update libraries to fix security issues and adapt to log4j2.
Introduce a data directory to be able to map moving data outside the docker container. Also move scheduling pattern file and config.xml file inside the instances directory.
Improved docker integration.
Fixed wrong path to save data when using cygwin.
Added Transaction operation to capabilities.
Catch exception if communication for CSW-T could not be found.
Add Basic Authentication to CSW-T-API, which can be configured via csw-t.realm.properties.
Do not cache CSW-T-Requests.
Increase file operation timeouts and increase default value from 200ms to 1 sec.
Added CSW-T functionality.
Remove all references to PortalU.
Option to request documents directly and not from cache due to caching bug
Use encrypted password for web interface.
Optimize relative file cache paths for big amounts of files (3 characters, equally distributed even with same prefixed record ids ).
Use nio based file access in file caches.
Speed up XML serialization/deserialization and XPATH performance.
Fixed incompatibilities with Java 8
Add GetRecords per GET Request to the interface.
Add JAVA8 compatiblity.
Added license header to all source files for Open Source migration.
Fix date comparable queries, do not analyze field 'modified'.
Add missing gmd:contact element and add all gmd:CI_Citation/gmd:date elements, not only revision dates to satisfy the GDI-DE test suite.
Add missing DQ_DataQuality/scope element in response for element set summary.
Fix wrong GeographicBoundingBox order in response for element sets summary and brief.
Add message if NO records could be obtained from a iPlug.
Include schemaLocation in CSW.
No Indexing of old cached records if iBus is deactivated !
Add colored messages for WARN and ERROR log messages.
Added element SearchStatus to result document and add language parameter to getCapabilities document, which also can be queried.
Restrict max. records for CSW requests to 500, avoiding possible OOM Exception.
CSW queryable operateson is now indexed with name space instead of the pure UUID (srv:operatesOn@xlink:href instead of srv:operatesOn@uuidref).
Fix dependencies to geotk libraries. Java7 compatibility fix.
Use german analyzer when creating/searching lucene index, now configured via XML.
Add java parameter "-Dfile.encoding=UTF8" to start script.
Added filter for idf:abstract and idf:keyword.
Fix numbers in log messages. Start from 1 instead of 0. Fix problem with numbers if results can be divided by 10.
Fix dependencies to geotk libraries.
CRITICAL: Remove document cache for Capability and DescribeRecord documents, since those cached documents may be invalidated by the SOAP Framework.
Match case handling for indexing and querying.
Make mapping of resourceidentifier to lucene index more robust.
Add missing ows:role Element to all capabilities.
Add missing configuration value to remove restriction of returned records.
Fix XPATH query for extracting organisationname values from IDF records.
Fix problem with concurrent access of the interface.
Upgrade jquery to Version 1.8.0. Add workaround for ajax caching IE behavior.
Fix paths in start script when started via cygwin on windows.
Remove open file handles that prevent deletion/renaming of folders under windows.
Add support for Parameter nextRecord for GetRecord results. Throw Exceptions for invalid parameter startPosition and maxRecords.
Added local working directory, so that temp-dir is not deleted accidentally when cleaning up global temp dir.
Initial Release. Harvesters can be configured to collect data, which is stored in an index file.
